attributes.action: insist on the resignation of Culture Secretary Tessa Jowell for allowing such a stupid, disgusting, downgrading and ludicrious logo to be used for the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most of the politicians in power today seem to be trying to degrade and make Britain the laughing stock of the world with their policies. We have had to put up with enormous amounts of humiliation from nations across the world because we have such idiots in power who think they know what is best for the UK population when in actual fact they know nothing, ask the public what they think, DONT assume, the politicians are a very very small minority (who are paid by the people who they are SUPPOSED to represent) in comparison with the 60+ million British population.
